title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\ResourcePolicySnapshotSchedulePolicy
name: ResourcePolicySnapshotSchedulePolicy
description:
A snapshot schedule policy specifies when and how frequently snapshots are to be created for the target disk. Also specifies how many and how long these scheduled snapshots should be retained.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.ResourcePolicySnapshotSchedulePolicy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.retention_policy
params.description: Retention policy applied to snapshots created by this resource policy.

params.name: data.schedule
params.description: A Vm Maintenance Policy specifies what kind of infrastructure maintenance we are allowed to perform on this VM and when. Schedule that is applied to disks covered by this policy.

params.name: data.snapshot_properties
params.description: Properties with which snapshots are created such as labels, encryption keys.
